DOC.brief_summary: The open-label study to allow pediatric patients who have participated in prior Levetiracetam (Keppra®) studies to continue their treatment with adequate monitoring and standardized follow-up care until Levetiracetam (Keppra®) is approved for use in children or until the completion of the development program for pediatrics.
DOC.brief_title: A Study Of The Safety And Efficacy Of Levetiracetam (Keppra®) (Ucb L059) In Children With Epilepsy
DOC.criteria: Have completed Study N151, or any other applicable pediatric trials of Levetiracetam (Keppra®) Be a patient for whom the treatment of Levetiracetam (Keppra®) would be of potential benefit such that the patient/parent(s)/legal guardian and the Investigator agree to continue treatment. Not be on a ketogenic diet (during the course of this study). Not have seizures too close together to accurately count (i.e., the patient's seizures must be countable).
